meanings.definition: The working of wonders or miracles.
meanings.sent1: The thaumaturgy of the magician amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The ancient book contained secrets of thaumaturgy.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the idea of using thaumaturgy to make their toys come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to bring joy to others seemed like a form of thaumaturgy.
meanings.sent5: The thaumaturgy of nature was evident in the blooming flowers.

meanings.definition: The performance of miracles or magic.
meanings.sent1: The wizard's thaumaturgy left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: The circus performer's act included elements of thaumaturgy.
meanings.sent3: The idea of using thaumaturgy to clean the house amused the children.
meanings.sent4: His sleight of hand was so skillful, it seemed like thaumaturgy.
meanings.sent5: The magician's thaumaturgy captivated the entire audience.
